data.name: Fix log_strategy_reason function call error
data.description: An issue has been reported with the 'log_strategy_reason()' function showing a 'missing 1 required positional argument: 'reason''. This indicates a mismatch between the function definition and function call in the code. The repair should target identifying any changes in the function definition that may now require an additional argument and confirm that the function is called with all the required arguments.

data.name: Default/Fallback Strategy Implementation
data.description: Develop a default or fallback strategy when 'No backtest results found.' This strategy will ensure the system keeps operating and potentially identify trading opportunities instead of going idle.

data.name: Predictive Market Forecasting Algorithm
data.description: This feature aims to design and implement a predictive algorithm that will forecast market trends. It will take into account both historical data and real-time market changes to provide a comprehensive analysis and predictions. This will help users to make informed decisions about their trading and investments.

data.name: AI-Driven Market Trend Predictor
data.description: Implementation of an AI-driven model that analyzes and forecasts market trends, providing improved trading strategies based on these insights.

data.name: Real-time Market Trend Analysis
data.description: This feature allows users to view real-time, analytics-driven market trend insights within the dashboard.

data.name: Analytic Prediction
data.description: This feature uses AI and machine learning to predict future price movements of various assets.

data.name: Automation of Strategy Selection
data.description: Transition from the startup phase to a live trading environment by focusing on automating the strategy selection process based on backtest results. This feature should enhance trading decisions. In the event of consistent absence of backtest results, it's crucial to investigate and address the root cause of this problem as part of the roadmap implementation.
